<item>
  <title>Global sea ice hits record low for January as the annual polar melting period expanded</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/environment/sea-ice-global-new-low-arctic-antarctic-melting-a8215706.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[The amount of ice in the world last month was the lowest ever recorded in any January]]></description>
  <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 19:48:10 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a8215706</guid>
  <author>Jane Dalton</author>
  <dc:creator>Jane Dalton</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2018-02-17T19:48:10+00:00</dc:date>
  <media:thumbnail url="https://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/styles/feed/public/thumbnails/image/2016/06/04/18/web-svalbard-sea-ice-rex.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:content url="https://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2016/06/04/18/web-svalbard-sea-ice-rex.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>Melting Arctic sea ice poses a major threat to polar bears' survival  (Picture: Rex)</media:text>
</item>
<item>
  <title>Sound waves could be used to prevent millions of birds flying into wind turbines</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/environment/sound-waves-prevent-millions-birds-flying-wind-turbines-farms-a8214356.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA['Putting large, rotating structures that look like mincemeat-makers in the sky isn't going to be good']]></description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 21:41:00 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a8214356</guid>
  <author>Josh Gabbatiss</author>
  <dc:creator>Josh Gabbatiss</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2018-02-16T21:41:00+00:00</dc:date>
  <media:thumbnail url="https://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/styles/feed/public/thumbnails/image/2018/02/16/16/bird-building-sky.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:content url="https://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2018/02/16/16/bird-building-sky.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>New York tall building and flock of birds flying  (Picture: Getty Images)</media:text>
</item>
